Oakland County’s (MI) Semi-Pro Soccer Team. #OCFC
Jan 14

2017 OCFC Open Tryouts to be held on March 17th and March 24th

Here’s your chance to step on the pitch with some of the best this summer as we host Open Tryouts on both March 17th and March 24th. You pick your date. SPOTS ARE LIMITED! DEADLINE TO REGISTER: MARCH 5TH.

  • Date: March 17th OR March 24th
  • Time: 9:00 PM-11:30 PM (registration begins at 9:00)
  • Location: Oakland University Athletic Dome (2200 N. Squirrel Road, Rochester, MI 48309)
  • Cost: $50 — includes training top and 2017 Season Ticket
  • SPOTS LIMITED TO 50 REGISTRANTS PER TRYOUT; DEADLINE TO REGISTER: MARCH 5TH
  • Register HERE

Due to popular demand in 2016, we’ve created two separate tryout dates with limited spots per tryout to allow for maximum exposure for each registrant. Space is limited, register today! To register, click here.

Oakland County Football Club is a Semi-Professional soccer team dedicated to providing a remarkable on-field product as well as an unforgettable game day experience. OCFC will strive to bring high-level soccer and entertainment to Oakland County and surrounding communities. Additionally, we aim to create a game day experience unlike any other that will cater to every audience, both youth and adult. OCFC’s long-term vision is to create a community backed club sponsored by both local and regional organizations, which will give back to the residents of the community in the form of pride and community involvement.
